statements: SELECT * FROM subscriber_preferences;
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name FROM subscriber_preferences;
SELECT email_address FROM subscriber_preferences WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_preferences WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT subscriber_id, interaction_history->'login' AS last_login FROM subscriber_preferences;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_preferences WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM subscriber_preferences WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT subscriber_id, interaction_history FROM subscriber_preferences WHERE email_address = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_preferences WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND interaction_history ->> 'event' = 'clicked';
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name FROM subscriber_preferences ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM subscribers ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscription_date FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, subscriber_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE content_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM subscribers WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT subscriber_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, interaction_type, content_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_data->'page' = 'homepage';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, first_name, last_name, subscription_date FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM subscribers ORDER BY email_address DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM subscriber_preferences WHERE preference_name = 'notification';
SELECT * FROM subscribers LIMIT 5;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, first_name FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, preference_name, preference_value FROM subscribers LEFT JOIN subscriber_preferences ON subscribers.subscriber_id = subscriber_preferences.subscriber_id;
SELECT subscriber_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM subscriber_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name FROM subscribers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, subscription_date FROM subscribers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT subscriber_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE subscriber_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, preference_key, preference_value FROM subscribers JOIN preferences ON subscribers.subscriber_id = preferences.subscriber_id WHERE preference_key = 'theme';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, interaction_data->>'click_count' AS click_count FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY click_count DESC
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, first_name FROM subscribers WHERE last_name='Doe';
SELECT email_address, subscription_date FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT content_type, content_value FROM dynamic_content WHERE content_type='announcement';
SELECT email_id, email_subject FROM personalized_emails WHERE send_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM subscriber_preferences WHERE preference_key = 'theme_color';
SELECT email_subject, email_body FROM personalized_emails WHERE send_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('click', 'open') ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
